=== About Me ===

I'm a PHP Developer by trade, and a Linux and Ubuntu advocate at heart. I'm currently the team contact for the NewJerseyTeam.

My Blog can currently be found at <nowiki>[[http://www.joeterranova.net|joeterranova.net]]</nowiki>, and is also syndicated on <nowiki>[[http://planet.ubuntu.com|Planet Ubuntu Users]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://nj.ubuntu-us.org/planet|Planet New Jersey LoCo Team]]</nowiki>.
